comments: The absurdity of these tariffs is a kind of clue that it's all smoke and mirrors. The people behind Trump know exactly what they're doing. This stage show is far from over.

I’m 67.Aus had tariffs when I was a kid.They were got rid of in the 1980’s.Now the introduction of tariffs flies in the face of why they were cancelled. The abolition of tarries made everyone richer??
I’ve got some used rubber tires at home right now. If any American wants them, they can have them for free. You just have to pay shipping. Hit me up 🤙🏻
Well to be fair if you look at the working conditions to make an iPhone which comes from free trade... tariffs aren't bad...
